## NS.share() method

Share your computer with your factions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
share(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

RAM cost: 2.4 GB

Increases your rep gain of all faction work types while share is called. Scales with thread count.
